about_the_game:
The game universe "Pets" is already waiting for you - new active players!

Our game is created for all animal lovers and of course for those who already have their favorite pets!

Just click and get various pets with a certain probability in your inventory - from cats and dogs to turtles and hamsters!

We offer you:
- Exclusive drop for the most active community members in Discord!
- A percentage of the game's income goes to charities around the world!
- Collections of various pets that you can collect by simply clicking on the character in our clicker!

Drop mechanics:
- Drop for clicks: each click gives you a chance to get one of the rare items on Steam!
- Drop for the time spent in the game: every 3 hours you get an item of varying rarity!

Separate collections are placed under each drop mechanic.
For various activities in Discord, you also get access to unique Steam items!

What awaits you next?
- Online duels!
- Player ratings and separate seasons with top awards!
- Introduction of collecting mechanics into the game!
detailed_description:
DLC INFO
